content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TMRPT
      operator: equal_to
      value: N
    - name: MIDSTYPE
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: USUBJID
Match Datasets:
  - Name: TM
    Keys:
      - MIDSTYPE
Core:
  Id: CORE-000216
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: MIDSTYPE must be unique within subject when MIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE
  and TM.TMRPT = 'N'
Outcome:
  Message: MIDSTYPE is not unique within subject when MIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE and
    TM.TMRPT = 'N'
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0545
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "For Disease Milestones that can occur only once (TMRPT = \"N\")
                  the value of MIDS may be the value in MIDSTYPE or may be an
                  abbreviated version.\ 

                  SM\tMIDSTYPE\tMIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE and
                  TM.TMRPT = 'N'\tMIDSTYPE is unique per subject"
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 2.a
                Section: '5.4'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SM
Executability: Fully Executable

json.Description: MIDSTYPE must be unique within subject when MIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE and TM.TMRPT = 'N'

Outcome.Message: MIDSTYPE is not unique within subject when MIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE and TM.TMRPT = 'N'

Citations.Cited_Guidance:
For Disease Milestones that can occur only once (TMRPT = "N") the value of MIDS may be the value in MIDSTYPE or may be an abbreviated version. 
SM	MIDSTYPE	MIDSTYPE = TM.MIDSTYPE and TM.TMRPT = 'N'	MIDSTYPE is unique per subject
